website_summaries.verdict: If you're tired of hand vacuums losing power and suction, consider Shark's corded Rocket model.
pros: Clear container so you can see when it's time to empty
cons: Almost needs two hands to operate
Heavier than many other handhelds because of its motor

customer_reviews.title: Easily cleans dog hair (golden retriever/lab) amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Far exceeded my expectations. Great price for a powerful vacuum. Cleaned all dog hair easily from my car with motorized attachment, crevice, and brush. Really nice to have a clean car!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk-useless warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this January 9, today, May 9, I'm using it for the second time. The motorized brush accessory is not working. I called the Shark and the "attachments" are not covered by the one year warranty. The whole purpose of buying this was to vacuum the upholster in my car to pick up dog hair. Without the brush, the whole thing is useless. Beware of Shark products, they aren't the quality they would lead you to believe and they don't stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lady

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I owned this for 2 months and the brush roll stopped working so the vacuum had no suction power whatsoever. I called Shark’s product support and they said I had to replace the motor which would cost $50. Needless to say I am not happy with this product and will not be buying Shark products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best. Vacuum. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: This could very well be my favorite purchase from amazon. I have always HATED vacuuming my stairs and never could find an easy way to do it. This vacuum is a game changer. It is super light weight with great suction. The brush head bends backwards slightly making it super easy to vacuum stairs. I honestly have no complaints about this. It is amazing - everyone with stairs in their home needs one of these! Ps it also makes vacuuming couches easy too!! Does the trick to easily clean up after all of the hair from my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Thought the Shark product line would work better
customer_reviews.text: Have heard great things about the Shark products. However, for the price I paid the actual vacuum does not work that well. The crevice tool is really the only attachment that actually picks up debris. The other brushes just seem to move the debris around without picking it up. The form factor of the vacuum is also a bit cumbersome. You can't really use the handle and vacuum at the same time. I really wish I would have returned it sooner, but I thought I would try it a few more times. But now the box has been discarded and I stuck with a vacuum that does not really suck.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: One Fatal Flaw
customer_reviews.text: One fatal flaw, not durable There is a tiny plastic hinge on the waste cover that will break shortly after dumping a couple of times. Too bad, a great little vac that I was excited to use in our RV. Didn't last a day. They should design the dump cover like the filter cover on top that will just detach rather than break. Should be an easy design change but until it is improved do not buy
customer_reviews.author: P. Lutzi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Used three times. On stairs only. Beater brush stops spinning despite all cleaning/disassembly efforts. Will spin for a few seconds and stop again. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Bum

customer_reviews.title: Very weak suction
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a huge mistake. We bought it mainly to clean dust off of our (navy) couch. We preferred a lightweight cordless to keep handy for regular use, but but went with this electricity powered vacuum because a powerful suction was more important to us. What a joke. We get better results using a dust brush. It is ineffective AND has a cord. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum , people say the cord is too short just put an extension cord on it , the tools are great, The reason why I gave it four stars is because the suction is not so powerful but with the tools in it it’s just fine , but it is powerful enough, if the suction was really bad I would send it back ,but I’m keeping this one. I would have gave it 4 1/2 stars ,but don’t worry about the suction it’s fine, it’s OK. And very light weight I didn’t find it heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: SHARKY

customer_reviews.title: Watch out Nooks and Crannies!
customer_reviews.text: Watch out nooks and crannies, I'm coming for you! This little machine takes cleaning a house to a whole new level. As much as I like the idea of a cordless hand vac, it was impractical. I have 2 cats and 3 dogs and more fur than a brief 8 min charge could tackle. A corded hand vac is a must. My full size Dyson vacuum is great for the floors but awkward in small spaces. This Skark conquers them like a champ. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.

customer_reviews.title: Picks up cat hair like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: When I first took the vacuum out of the box, I was a little doubtful of its power given how small and light it is, but this petite little vacuum pulled all of the cat hair up off my couch on the first pass and additionally picked up an embarrassing amount of dust. The little power brush attachment is everything I hoped it would be. The power cord isn't super long, but I should only need an extension cord when I take it out to vacuum my car. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love this his product as all shark vacs
customer_reviews.text: Love this his product as all shark vacs, I bought this for my car. I have a dog that loves to go on car rides but h sheds so much. I hated dragging out my stand up vac. The thing I like the most of this compact vac is that it has a motorized brush, which any dog owner knows is necessary to pick up hair from a rug. Cleaning is easy just open the compartment over a trash bin and done. I highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Not all that great ....
customer_reviews.text: I bought the corded hand vacuum because the many cordless models I have used through the years did not hold power well. I thought that being a plug-in, there would be more power ... sustainable. Good things: the power is sustained because of the corded feature. And the unit is light-weight, too. Bad things - suction is much, much weaker than I anticipated. Cord is too short. So, if you just want a vacuum to suck up dust bunnies in the laundry room or Cherrios from the kitchen floor - this is find. To clean those hard to reach carpeted areas or carpet along floorboards ... take a pass.
customer_reviews.author: michie

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and versatility!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have stairs - but I do have cats that love to hang out in my curtain-covered windows. The motorized brush did a fantastic job of pulling off the cat hair without harming the curtains - I even tried it on lace (those hairs really cling to lace) and again, it worked like a charm. It looked like I was losing a cat when I emptied the bin - it was easy to empty, too. The Rocket is light weight and easy to carry - it makes tidying up a breeze. The regular brush was great for cleaning, and straightening, the long fringe on the oriental rug. This is a great product; I wish I had purchased it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H Duff

customer_reviews.title: Works for fur, and stairs.
customer_reviews.text: The hose is a bit short and so is the cord so it requires an extension cord for stairs. I wish they had a straight wand attachment for upright vacuming as well. The power and suction were everything I had hoped for, but I had to be flexible when this wasn't. We have 4 dogs and 2 cats, so I am very happy with the fur pick up and being able to vacume fur off the stairs with this.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: barely works on dog hair... horrible product. Your better off buying a shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: Shambles75

customer_reviews.title: No Hepa Filter
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I got this and was not expecting it to work so well for cleaning my stairs. I thought my regular Vacuum and attachments were doing the job but my carpeted stairs look so much cleaner. I was shocked b/c the suction from the beater bar does not seem as strong as with it off. I will note that there is no Hepa Filter and if using this on stairs the exhaust comes out of the back and blows you directly in the face when getting the vertical sides of the steps. Just a note for those with allergies :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice suction at first, but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cleaning my car every once in a while, but just started using it frequently to vacuum my couch. After a couple weeks of frequent use, the suction stopped working as well and the motor started running loudly. I tried cleaning the filter, but no luck. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small vacuum that I could use on my stairs. This one is amazing! My dog likes to sleep on the stairs and I could not clean them very well with my large upright. This little guy is super easy to carry up the stairs. I used it as soon as it arrived and was so happy! No more dog hair on my stairs! I love that it's corded, so there's no need to worry about charge. I do wish the cord was a few feet longer.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Ross

customer_reviews.title: Carpeted Stairs?  This product is for you!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my carpeted stairs were clean. But I always struggled with a traditional vacuum on the stairs. The balance, the pushing, the bulkiness. I was primarily looking for a lightweight and portable vacuum to get rid of the shedding dog hairs. During the first use, I was amazed that the dog hair it picked up AND the dirt too. This is the only way to clean carpeted stairs. You will love the fully motorized power brush. Nicely done Shark. My only MINOR criticism is that cord might be longer--but I put a heavy-duty extension cable on it to resolve this. Try it and you'll be surprised. This vaccuum really sucks (and that is a major compliment)!
customer_reviews.author: BWC

customer_reviews.title: great handheld vacuum
customer_reviews.text: awesome handheld vacuum this thing works great especially on pet hair i have a dog who sheds a ton and this vacuum eats it all up with ease . it’s very easy to dump what ever it picks up and easy to maintain my only complaints are i wish the cord was longer and the collection container was larger but other than that it’s a great vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent supplement to a regular vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent supplement to my regular upright vacuum. I purchased it to vacuum out dog crates and the couch. Seems to tackle pet hair pretty well. I use this several times a week for little jobs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Prentiss

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We got this for RV life, for which it is absolutely perfect! I also had the pleasure of using it while deep cleaning our apartment for the end of our lease. It’s really helpful! The suction is great and the attachments work super well. I also really like that the filters can just be rinsed, air dried, and reused!
customer_reviews.author: K Gaston

customer_reviews.title: This Shark Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Shark Rocket Cordless Hand Vacuum that I’ve purchased after the first one broke while someone (who remains nameless) decided to use it during a water flood in the basement. (Don’t Ask!) But I was so impressed with the first one, I ordered a second one that was exactly the same. This vacuum is a strong sucker and I use it on the stairs, small carpet disasters, carpet, wood floors, you name in. I even use it on the bedroom blanket after my shedding Labrador sneaks a nap on the bed! I couldn’t - and wouldn’t - ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: LCarol

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: I have such a deep love for this vacuum. My stairs in my home are more than 6 feet WIDE and it is a huge pain to vacuum them with a traditional vacuum. Little vacuums in the past did not pack the right amount of suction to conquer the job. This little shark has changed my life. I have less gray hair and my mood has improved exponentially. The sun shines brighter and the birds sing sweeter now. Pretty sure even the gas mileage in my car has improved. Thank you Shark. Thank you. (tears flowing)
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly to vacuum my car. It works well and has good suction. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I would have liked the cord to be a bit longer. I have to plug it in to two different outlets to get my car completely vacuumed and its kind of a pain. The user manual specifically states not to use an extension cord. Other than that, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Turgiss

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay running
customer_reviews.text: Think I would have loved it.. except it keeps tripping the breaker. Doesn’t matter which outlet I used, it tripped every time within 10 seconds. Calling to return tomorrow. Guess I’m looking for a cordless.
customer_reviews.author: Tamlynn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every review I read on Google for best vacuum for cleaning stairs recommended the Shark Rocket Hand Vac. That is absolutely crazy!!! The cord is 15' and our outlet is on the stair landing. I could only vacuum 4 stairs out of 12. I went back to the instruction book and found, "The use of an extension cord is NOT recommended. I spoke to a representative from Shark, who told me, "It only comes with a 15' cord." Who did all those stupid reviews, missing essential information? I have a number of shark vacuums in my house now, and this is the end of Shark for me. Disappointed. Upset. Misled. STUPID 15' CORD!
customer_reviews.author: M Scalzi

customer_reviews.title: Good for pet hair on carpet
customer_reviews.text: If you use the brush head for upholstery, it picks up all the pet fur stuck on my carpet. But if I just need it to pick up some dust from the table, it doesn’t do anything. Maybe all vacuums don’t pick up dust if dust is settled.
customer_reviews.author: sapphira

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have ever left a negative review, but this time I have no choice! I bought this vacuum to make it easier to vacuum the steps inside my home...BIG MISTAKE! This is the worst handheld vacuum I have ever owned! The suction on this vacuum is horrible, and it is very awkward to use! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!! (I need a new upright vacuum, too...but I definitely WON'T BUY a Shark!)
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: This Hand Held Vac is the best that I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: This Hand Held Vac is the best that I've purchased. I had a hand held vac that was cordless that was great until the battery gave out soon after I used it for a short period of time. I didn't want another cordless so, when I saw this one with a very long cord, I purchased it right away. I like Shark products so, being a recognized brand and found on the Amazon website, I didn't hesitate. I can say that the suction of this Vac will not leave anything behind but the rug or floor you use it on. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce D.

customer_reviews.title: Using it daily since 2016.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a full timer RVer, outdoorsy and have cats. The Shark Rocket corded is perfect for my needs. It has great suction, the tools allow for cleaning nooks, crannies, carpet, tile, and pet hair. Sometimes I boondock without electricity, so I find it easier to flick on my generator and use the full power of a corded vacuum rather than a battery operated one. I bought my shark in 2016 and it’s still working! I suggest buying the replacement filters. If/when this vacuum poops out on me, I’m buying the exact same thing again if it’s still available!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good vac BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I like this hand vac BUT the cord is not long enough to vaccum my stairs. I have to plug it in at the top of the stairs and then plug it in at the bottom of the stairs. For the price paid I think this is ridiculous! It has great suction and the attachments work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had doubts, they were wrong
customer_reviews.text: I finally pulled the trigger on this because I had bought Amazons choice vacumm for like $80 and although it was ok I felt like for 80 I'd get more especially with all those ratings. So for a small handheld at about the same price I was doubtful I'd get what I wanted. I have a pug that rolls around on a really nice black thin carpet I have. Although it takes a few back and forth motions I can see the black again. This is great, it sucked up a ton of dust too just from the air. So I'm going to look for the big boy version of this and try and get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Greyjack

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, something small to take around the house to get the dog hair tumbleweeds in the corners and the windowsills and the small places my regular vacuum strugles with. I love that I don’t have to charge it and that it plugs in. You do have to switch outlets here and there as you go but it’s well worth being able to finish everything and not run out of power. It has good suction and I love all the attachments. This was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Attention all pet owners !
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little vacuum for quick clean ups and those little pet hair clumps that seem to accumulate daily. My dog must spend most of his time growing more hair because he leaves it all around the house. This Shark vacuum has excellent suction and is Very handy to use. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants a very handy, powerful little vacuum. I am completely satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruger Pete

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design and Features
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is very convenient to use and works well. It’s easy to vacuum a car with the crevice attachment because you don’t have to deal with a bulky hose or canister. The rotating brush works well and does a good job on our carpeted stairs. It also does pretty well at removing pet hair from our couch (we have short hair dogs and it’s going to be difficult for anything to dig their hair out of our couch fabric). I’ve only had it for two months so I don’t know about the reliability. It has a good filter that is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MS Boy

customer_reviews.title: Some Tools Not Included
customer_reviews.text: I like this sweet little vacuum because it is easy to use. One problem that I found really annoying: It does NOT come with a basic tool which is the wide upholstery tool--you order that separately. In the manual they send, they list all the tools that are available without noting that only some of the tools are actually in the box. Not putting this basic, probably most used tool, in the box to begin with lost this vacuum two stars. Thinking of returning the whole thing...
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Shark Rocket
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of this vacuum. I LOVE it. So much so that I bought two for Christmas gifts. Great suction, has beater brush which most small hand vacs don't have, has a light so I can see what I'm cleaning, long power cord so I can get places, great for stairs, closets, halls, to use after the dogs bring in grass clippings or leaves, and the sponge and felt filter inside wash easily and you can order extra filters from Amazon. Very easy to clean, really picks up the dirt, dust. Easy to empty into garbage, no bags. Great vac.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: SPINNER BRUSH STOPPED WORKING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used one time and it broke! The spinning brush stopped spinning and it wasn't even dirty. Also the cord is super short, I bought this for my stairs and couches. I'm honestly surprised it has such great reviews!
customer_reviews.author: brittaney

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my car, but use it for much more
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small portable vacuum, but didn't want a battery-operated one since they're never charged when needed and the battery usually runs out before I'm finished. I purchased this and am simply amazed at how well it work, how easy it is to handle, and how easy it is to empty out. The attachments are great! I also trim my two dogs, so cleanup is so much easier now that I have this vacuum. I'm considering replacing my backpack vacuum with a Shark floor model since I like this handheld one so much!
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this vacuum! I read the reviews of this one and several others to the point I was overwhelmed over purchasing a little vacuum! But I bit the bullet and bought this one and am so glad I did. It is as good if not better than described. I bought it mainly for vacuuming cat hair from couch and carpeted stairs. And it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy G

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for cat hair.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has lasted 2 years of daily use in our camper with myself, husband and cat. My cat sheds horribly and it does better than other vacuums at getting up his hair. I’m buying another for my house since we’ll be spending a little time there this summer. I like that the brush head pivots so you don’t have to get after things in a funky angle. The vacuum adjusts as you move. I use it in my entire camper. At home I’ll use it on upholstered furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for stairs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only for carpeted stairs. That is the only way I have used it and it is pretty terrible. I go over the same stairs over and over, and can still see pet hair and other debris on the stairs. After multiple attempts, I'll use another vacuum made for regular floors and although it is much heavier, a lot more is picked up. I bought this a year ago, and after trying to use it multiple times, and now it just sits unused on a shelf since it is basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: daniell

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for carpeted stairs, just needs a longer power cord.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 3-floor townhouse and got this vac exclusively for vacuuming our carpeted stairs. It's great. The beater brush attachment isn't QUITE as good as a full upright vacuum, but it's probably 75% as good. The better mobility on stairs makes that worthwhile to me. My one complaint that others also have is that the power cord is too short for stairs. I have to use an extension cord. It also doesn't have a cord wind-up mechanism which would be a really nice QOL feature addition.
customer_reviews.author: acosmichippo

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift I gave myself!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 4-legged furballs (cats). I am constantly having to clean up cat hair. This Shark Rocket makes it easy to do and more often. I do not have to pull out the vacuum every time I need it. Yes, it is corded but, I have had a wireless before and it didn't do the work this one did. I also love the attachments it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Holt

customer_reviews.title: This thing SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: No really... it sucked up dirt that I didn't even know was still there! I mean, I'd just used my old handheld vacuum to suck up pet hair from my couch the day before this arrived, and as a trial run, I used this on the couch again... it came away with a bin full of dust and dirt and pet hair that I couldn't even tell was still there. Very impressed with the performance on this!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hall

customer_reviews.title: So cute but no power
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a great size and thought I’d absolutely love it after reading the reviews. I just am not getting the suction, it’s too weak. I was so excited to buy this little thing and thought it would make my life easier than carrying around my big vacuum up and down stairs, sadly it doesn’t . The hose is also verrrry short
customer_reviews.author: organicgirl

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed in power
customer_reviews.text: Expected same suction power as home vac.. a little disappointed in power..
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Great for stairs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the stairs. The regular vacuum cleaner is far to big, heavy and awkward to really get them clean. This little sucker with the motorized brush head is doing an awesome job on stairs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Detlef Alle

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite thing. I have 3 dogs and keeping my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed! This is my new favorite thing. I have 3 dogs and keeping my couch clean WAS a frustrating nightmare. The Shark Rocket makes cleaning up very easy. I've never had any vacuum that picks up dog hair the way this does. I love that it's corded. The last pet vacuum I had was battery operate and I could never get my couch clean before the battery died. It also seems to pull out dust/dirt from the couch. My dogs are "ruff" on the furniture but once I use my Shark, the couch looks new all over again. Seriously, if you have dogs and they hair, you need this!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnia Langmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for so many things, the powered brush handles the stairs and furniture great, and great for spot cleaning on carpet as the powered brush breaks up dried material and sucks it up. The bag less cyclone is great to see what was picked up and the filters behind that handle the micro dirt particles.
customer_reviews.author: Wm

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is the first vacuum I've used in a long time that really works, aside from super expensive uprights that I've borrowed. I have a small apartment with only one room that has carpeting. I tried cordless, and they are garbage, so I knew I wanted a corded one. The attachments on this are easy to swap out, and it makes it easy to get along baseboards, great for furniture, just a great product. Easy to empty, too. And it fits easily in my tiny NYC closet.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie d

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I always used the Eureka EasyClean and was very impressed with the suction power for my carpeted stairs. After the switched failed twice on different machines, I decided to go with the Shark. While I don't think the suction is quite as strong, the versatility is great with the removable hose. I can use it on so many different things than I could the Eureka. The motorized brush is great. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bamabelle

customer_reviews.title: Runs like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this item 5 stars...it really is a great little vacuum. However, the head on the motorized brush randomly stops running. It will start back up after some adjusting which is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Try cleaning these things
customer_reviews.text: I love shark products but have to admit I somehow got condensation into the motor and it burned out on me. Its not that easy to keep the many parts clean but I tried. Don't give up on shark products because of 1 review because they truly are an incredible machine. I had to toss everything but the extra add ons into the trash. Didn't try to contact company because how do you get returns on a gift and when I myself cant explain how condensation caused the problem wish they could replace and give me better instructions for care!! Sadly for $100 I cant afford to buy another one and risk failure.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Tampa Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile product but still heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this vacuum and it comes with so many attachments and is highly versatile. I love it for cleaning my stairs or car when I can't lug around a regular vacuum. My only downfall with it is that it is still reasonably heavy considering it's smaller size and can definitely tire your arms out after prolonged use. That aside, it's a pretty rockstar vacuum :).
customer_reviews.author: Ehimmelman

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand-Held Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this little vacuum! We have an indoor bird and angora rabbit so we pick up odd things. It's not heavy, picks up alot of dust, excellent suction, super easy to clean out, can even pick up hay no problem then dump back out and not get tangled up in anything. Next model they should add a retractable cord and a light near the nozzle to make it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: jwatts

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between this and the dyson, and I ended up buying this because of the price, and I must say I'm pretty happy with it. It does what a vacuum is supposed to, and the extra accessories allows me to suck up all the dirt in small or difficult areas (like inside my car). I think it works about the same as dyson. If you're not looking for anything too fancy, this will do the job
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Could be designed better
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is good when you are doing stairs, but once the hose is attached, it becomes awkward and difficult to use. The design of it makes it difficult to maneuver when you are having to hold it and then reach with the other hand--you have to hold it out in front of you basically. If you try to put it on the floor when doing baseboards or low areas, the vacuum falls over and you basically are just dragging it on its side or upside down. I bought it mostly for stairs and that's about all i find it useful for.
customer_reviews.author: cj1433

customer_reviews.title: Good light weight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Loved this vacuum cleaner for the stairs! I got this vacuum cleaner because I was tired of trying to lug my gigantic vacuum up and down the stairs trying to clean them and only getting them decently clean. This little vacuum is lightweight and is easy to carry up and down the stairs. It would have been nice if the cord was a little longer but that’s definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: KatanaKitteh

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: For being so small, this little thing Rocks! My husband and I use it to clean our Jeeps. I have not used anything but the crevice tool yet, but I'm already impressed! Dog hair, food crumbs, normal dirt & stuff that your shoes drag in....it picks it all up! My Jeep is new so it doesn't have an excessive amount of cleaning needing to be done...but I think this vacuum would be good for it and good for maintenance cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to handle vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for handheld vacuum to clean fabric furnitures, bookshelves and toy bins and small areas around home and this is perfect for that. I’ve been using Dyson before this and compare to that, suction seems little less powerful but it still works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: gcs1024

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum! I use it to clean up the cat box area in my basement and clean cat hair off the furniture. It also works great for my stairs. Attachments are great and vacuum has great suction. Very impressed! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to use, Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum to do stairs and furniture. Vacuumed my two stair cases in less than 15 minutes. The vacuum is light weight, easy to hold. Love the flexible hose which makes doing the stairs easier. The rotary brush took all lint and dirt off the couch. MY husband will probably use it for our cars. (he is currently using a hand held shop vac that is heavy and difficult to manage in the car interior.)
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Dog hair defeated!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Anatolian Shepherd dog and he sheds like it's his religion. He goes to the groomer and I brush him but there's always some loose hair. The Shark Rocket is the answer to my prayers! It gets the hair and, too my horror and delight, pulled a ton of dirt from my furniture. And it's light enough for me, an aging disabled woman to use easily! I just wish there were onboard storage for the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Licht

customer_reviews.title: Good for stairs with carpet
customer_reviews.text: I like it - it has good suction and it is easy to be handled ... I gave 3 stars because few things - however overall I'm happy with it. - cable is too short - it didn't cover the length of my stairs, I had to use an extension - there is no design for cable storage - just hangs next to the device - for me it was a little bit heavy to handle it with only one hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic on furniture with pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LITTLE VACUUM! We have lots of cats and I needed something manageable to vacuum the furniture. It works so well that I vacuum the furniture more than I thought I would. I’ve seen complaints that the cord is too short, so I’ll just say EXTENSION CORD! Not an issue to be found with this guy and I would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JenE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for couch, stairs, and car!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vacuum! Perfect for the couch, stairs, and vehicle. Great suction power and very easy to clean. I have a German Shepherd so as you could imagine I use this regularly. The cord is a good length and beats having to deal with charging/batteries. The various accessory change outs are all equally great. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kenner

customer_reviews.title: Portable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable vacuum cleaner! One of my cats has very long silky hair the sticks to the carpet. I have a pet upright vacuum cleaner with a special attachment and is difficult to use on stairs. It also required a lot of work with the special attachment to get the hair up. It would take a good 25 minutes. With this portable vacuum I’m done in less than ten minutes vacuuming the stairs with little effort. This was a great purchase and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LucyLu

customer_reviews.title: Short cord.  Way short
customer_reviews.text: No. The cord is so short. I have an outlet top of stairs to the right. Maybe 1.5 ft. . 13 steps. I get half way. Unplug go downstairs plug in there. Do the other steps. There’s no way to take out where the dust is how to clean it. Which is always a shame because it works better than any other sweeper I have ever had for cat hair
customer_reviews.author: JANICE HANSEN

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several "re-chargeable" vacs. All of them were junk, including my Dyson. Didn't hold a charge, the charge didn't last past 5 minutes or the suction wasn't strong enough to pick up anything. THIS baby has a long cord and works like a charm on every thing. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bluetear

customer_reviews.title: Great handheld, picks up what my upright can’t.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing an upright that was supposed to be good for pet hair I found myself looking for another option. I figured a small vacuum that would be great for stairs, cars, etc would be good and then stumbled on this vacuum and reviews. In my opinion worth the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Eturn6

customer_reviews.title: Best I have tried so far...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I have tried so far. I recommend. Well made, lots of suckability, nice longer cord, it is good for loose cat litter, pet hair on the hardwood and tile floors and carpet for spot pickup. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Binghamton U Grad Student

customer_reviews.title: Power Product
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome, the suction power is great and the all round usefulness of the product makes it worth it. Stairs , carpet , even car messes are a easy clean with this. Picks up a lot of hair, I clean the rotation brush at the front after each use and it’s holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Assim ally

customer_reviews.title: Scary good!
customer_reviews.text: I got scared using this vacuum! In a good way. This things sucks up so good that you can see in the container all the dust and dead skin cells that's been lingering in the couch, sofa and bed! I use this primarily for cleaning after my Shiba and Catahoula who she's like nobody's business. Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY NOW!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A++++++++++++ this is honestly one of the best things I've ever bought, 2nd only to the tineco floor cleaner. The combo of these 2 products equal CLEANING PERFECTION! My favorite feature is the furniture vaccuming. And price is so low its unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney valentino

customer_reviews.title: I love my little Rocket
customer_reviews.text: It’s corded. There is no battery life and I prefer that. Anything that I have running on batteries, seems to quit before the job is done. I chose this wonderful corded product because they haven’t figured out yet how to make good batteries. My Rocket has become my best friend. It does a great job cleaning my house and my car. It’s quite powerful for a little guy, very light and comfortable for my arthritic hands, and has great attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Ilana Egner

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and easy to use, durable and substantial feel
customer_reviews.text: The rotating brush does a great job on our fabric couch picking up cat hair. The parts are easy to attach and use. It comes with a basic assortment of attachments, but more are available through the company for specific uses. I plan to buy the detail kit for computer/car cleaning. My only complaint is that it did not come with a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: On some occasions you just need to such it up.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum it makes cleaning those small areas so much easier and it is really powerful for its size. Really, it does a fantastic job. My only wish is that it had a cordless option or an adapter that can be used in my vehicle. Then, I would be able to take it with me in my car wherever I go. I have a big extended family with lots of kids. You know whenever you take the kids out or your husband uses your car how they leave a mess. Well, I digress. You get my drift. No pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: We have a robot vacuum for the floors and use this for everything else. The upholstery brush goes along all of the floor boards, into corners and works great for dusting horizontal blinds and furniture. We also use it in our cars and it held up cleaning my attic storage space full of heavier debris. Glad I bought this plug in vac!
customer_reviews.author: Belden Family

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power, convenient, tricky to clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for stairs, upholstery, bathrooms, cars, etc. with lots of power. The unit is lightweight and easier to hold and control than it appears in the picture. The one downside is that it's tricky to position a bag to collect the dirt as you pop open the bottom and everything falls out - plus, it's quite difficult to clean the dirty, dusty inside of the plastic collection cylinder. Need to work hard to get a wet cloth into the small spaces, so I suppose the idea is just to dump the dirt and leave the clear collection cylinder looking filthy?? Aside from this, does what I bought it for very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, not too loud and sucks up a lot of dog hair to boot
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is light weight, has a 15 foot electrical cord length, and will just plain suck up anything in its path. Because this vacuum cleaner is small, you will naturally have to dump out what has been collected frequently, but even that is a snap. Get one. This thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sheriff Buford T. Justice

customer_reviews.title: Well worth twice the price!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best portable vacuum cleaner that I have ever owned. It is quite powerful for its size, the carpet attachment works elegantly, the attachments fit together snugly and the entire system feel well-balanced. It is a delight to clean with this, as crazy as that sounds.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced another handheld that was ruined by a workman using it to clean up sheet rock dust. Didn't think it would work as well, but I like it just as well and maybe a little better! The suction is really great and changing the attachments is no problem. Haven't had a chance to use it a lot since I just received it a few weeks ago, but I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have 3 carpeted staircases and I needed something portable to vacuum them all with. This vacuum has some powerful suction. I want to get a full size shark now. I love all the attachments and I love that one of them actually has the spinning brush. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: So far (1 month) this thing works great. I like the cord, as there's never an issue with running out of charge. Comes with a variety of attachments. Very good suction. Flexible hose also makes it good for cleaning keyboards and other computer parts (just be careful - the thing really has strong suction).
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My first shark product. I was really impressed with it. We normally use our tyson for the home but decided on this to use for small areas like a dust buster. Good for getting in tight areas. It is light weight and does a good job
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!  Terrific on Stairs.
customer_reviews.text: We have a tri-level house and at my age I got tired of struggling with my regular vacuum on the stairs. Several different tools. This Shark Rocket is wonderful. The rotating tool is great on the steps. Would recommend it to anyone with stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa5k

customer_reviews.title: Great for all the cat related tasks
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I purchased this to clean my couch, bed and cat trees. I was going to get a Dyson so glad I saved my money. I'm really pleased with this unit and as it's only use is for specific areas the cord is no problem. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Charissa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Pro -compact -bag less -great suction -good powered brush Con -limited area via cord. Must buy retractable extension cord. -color options -no cord neat storage. Not even a Velcro cord tie. -a bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: Gogo PLata

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum. Bought for a wedding present because I loved mine. Perfect to get in hard to reach areas especially if you have a pet that’s hair gets in and under hard to reach areas. Light weight and that’s important to me.
customer_reviews.author: alishia

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do stairs and the car. It is a lot easier to work with than my large dyson. I don’t think the suction is super great but I know little vacuums don’t have as much suction as larger vacuums. But it is easy to work with I love all the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: mgracem

customer_reviews.title: Incredible results! Must have if you have pets!
customer_reviews.text: I am in amazement! I have 3 cats... my couch was covered in fur... until I used this vacuum. I never thought a small vacuum like this could make it look new... GET THIS VACUUM IF YOU HAVE PETS!
customer_reviews.author: Rb

customer_reviews.title: got a pet that sheds??? Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beagle who sheds a lot of hair all year round and this unit gets it all up off the furniture. While it is corded it is long enough to use on the couches without moving the plug to different outlets. Haven't tried it in my car yet but I am sure it works great there too. I cannot vouch the durability of the unit as it is a recent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: ... shepherds and this beast was able to clean up better than any vacuum I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Have two German shepherds and this beast was able to clean up better than any vacuum I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I can’t break it!
customer_reviews.text: After ruining several vacuum cleaners for various reasons (removing the bag without replacing and frying the motor, trying to vacuum up sizeable solid objects, etc) this bad boy has really made me step up my game. It’s lightweight with a long cord and still works after dropping it down the stairs, so.. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great vacccum for stairs, couches especially for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. The suction is unbelievable especially with the brush head. Makes it so easy to vacuum the stairs. Gets all the pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: mlm

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.  Suction is good.  I have used it for long, and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Previously, I had a Dust Devil, and it was a toy compared to this. As a matter of fact, it cleans one of my rugs more completely than my Miele Canister. The suction is very satisfactory for its intended purpose. EDIT: This was a wonderful purchase. I had an accident with mine and had to buy a second. I did not hesitate to buy the same thing. The damaged one was a wonderful friend
customer_reviews.author: DSLR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome, brings the power of a home vacuum to a semi truck. I've got a 60 lb English Springer Spaniel and this vacuum just picks up everything, and fast. I used cheap Hoover Dust Devils for years and it took forever to chase stuff around the semi when it would flling stuff instead of picking it up.
customer_reviews.author: jw

product_meta.title: Shark Rocket Ultra-Light with TruePet Mini Motorized Brush and 15-foot Power Cord Hand Vacuum (HV292), Maroon
product_meta.description:
At less than 4 pounds, the Shark Rocket Hand Vac is ultra-lightweight and convenient for cleaning. It comes with the TruePet Motorized Brush for deep cleaning in the palm of your hand and an easy-to-empty dust cup. With a 15- foot-long power cord you can clean a whole room from start to finish without interruption.

BRAND STORY
By Shark
feature_bullets: Portable and ultra-lightweight. Less than 4 pounds in total
True Pet Motorized Brush for handheld deep cleaning
Easy-to-empty dust cup. No bag needed and empties with the touch of a button.
15-foot-long power cord You never have to recharge, while giving you freedom to clean the whole room.
Powerful cleaning from start to finish.Amperage (amps):3.4

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,092 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
